<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2890</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gender Equality</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschlecht-Gleichheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Égalité De Genre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Igualdade Do Gender</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uguaglianza Di Genere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισότητα γένους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Igualdad Del Género</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit which examines whether society treats men and woman equally.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stereotypes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gender</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit, die 
überprüft, ob Gesellschaft Männer und Frau gleichmäßig behandelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive qui examine si la
société traite les hommes et la femme également.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa que examine se a 
sociedade trata homens e mulher ingualmente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva che esamina se la 
società cura ugualmente gli uomini e la donna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα που 
εξετάζει εάν η κοινωνία θεραπεύει τους άνδρες και τη γυναίκα 
εξίσου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva que examina si 
la sociedad trata a hombres y a mujer igualmente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stereotypen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschlecht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
